verses.verse: For I do not want <S%G2309><s%> you to be unaware, <S%G50><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> that our fathers <S%G3962><s%> were all <S%G3956><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> the cloud, <S%G3507><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> passed <S%G1330><s%> through <S%G1330><s%> the sea; <S%G2281><s%>
and all <S%G3956><s%> were baptized <S%G907><s%> into Moses <S%G3475><s%> in the cloud <S%G3507><s%> and in the sea; <S%G2281><s%>
and all <S%G3956><s%> ate <S%G2068><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> spiritual <S%G4152><s%> food; <S%G1033><s%>

and all <S%G3956><s%> drank <S%G4095><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> spiritual <S%G4152><s%> drink, <S%G4188><s%> for they were drinking <S%G4095><s%> from a spiritual <S%G4152><s%> rock <S%G4073><s%> which followed <S%G190><s%> them; and the rock <S%G4073><s%> was Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
Nevertheless, <S%G235><s%> with most <S%G4183><s%> of them God <S%G2316><s%> was not well-pleased; for they were laid <S%G2693><s%> low <S%G2693><s%> in the wilderness. <S%G2048><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> happened <S%G1096><s%> as examples <S%G5179><s%> for us, that we should not crave <S%G1510><s%> <S%G1938><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> things, <S%G2556><s%> as they also <S%G2548><s%> craved. <S%G1937><s%>

And do not be idolaters, <S%G1496><s%> as some <S%G5100><s%> of them were; as it is written, <S%G1125><s%> "The people <S%G2992><s%> sat <S%G2523><s%> down <S%G2523><s%> to eat <S%G2068><s%> and drink, <S%G4095><s%> and stood <S%G450><s%> up to play. <S%G3815><s%>"

Nor <S%G3366><s%> let us act <S%G4203><s%> immorally, <S%G4203><s%> as some <S%G5100><s%> of them did, <S%G4203><s%> and twenty-three thousand <S%G5505><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> in one <S%G1520><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>
Nor <S%G3366><s%> let us try <S%G1598><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> as some <S%G5100><s%> of them did, <S%G3985><s%> and were destroyed <S%G622><s%> by the serpents. <S%G3789><s%>
Nor <S%G3366><s%> grumble, <S%G1111><s%> as some <S%G5100><s%> of them did, <S%G1111><s%> and were destroyed <S%G622><s%> by the destroyer. <S%G3644><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> happened <S%G4819><s%> to them as an example, <S%G5179><s%> and they were written <S%G1125><s%> for our instruction, <S%G3559><s%> upon whom <S%G3739><s%> the ends <S%G5056><s%> of the ages <S%G165><s%> have come. <S%G2658><s%>
Therefore <S%G5620><s%> let him who thinks <S%G1380><s%> he stands <S%G2476><s%> take <S%G991><s%> heed <S%G991><s%> lest <S%G3361><s%> he fall. <S%G4098><s%>

No <S%G3756><s%> temptation <S%G3986><s%> has overtaken <S%G2983><s%> you but such <S%G442><s%> as is common <S%G442><s%> to man; <S%G442><s%> and God <S%G2316><s%> is faithful, <S%G4103><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> will not allow <S%G1439><s%> you to be tempted <S%G3985><s%> beyond <S%G5228><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> you are able, <S%G1410><s%> but with the temptation <S%G3986><s%> will provide <S%G4160><s%> the way <S%G1545><s%> of escape <S%G1545><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> that you may be able <S%G1410><s%> to endure <S%G5297><s%> it.
Therefore, <S%G1355><s%> my beloved, <S%G27><s%> flee <S%G5343><s%> from idolatry. <S%G1495><s%>
I speak <S%G3004><s%> as to wise <S%G5429><s%> men; <S%G5429><s%> you judge <S%G2919><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> I say. <S%G5346><s%>

Is not the cup <S%G4221><s%> of blessing <S%G2129><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> we bless <S%G2127><s%> a sharing <S%G2842><s%> in the blood <S%G129><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>? Is not the bread <S%G740><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> we break <S%G2806><s%> a sharing <S%G2842><s%> in the body <S%G4983><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>?

Since <S%G3754><s%> there is one <S%G1520><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> we who are many <S%G4183><s%> are one <S%G1520><s%> body; <S%G4983><s%> for we all <S%G3956><s%> partake <S%G3348><s%> of the one <S%G1520><s%> bread. <S%G740><s%>
Look <S%G991><s%> at the nation <S%G4561><s%> Israel; <S%G2474><s%> are not those <S%G3588><s%> who eat <S%G2068><s%> the sacrifices <S%G2378><s%> sharers <S%G2844><s%> in the altar <S%G2379><s%>?

What <S%G5101><s%> do I mean <S%G5346><s%> then <S%G3767><s%>? That a thing <S%G1494><s%> sacrificed <S%G1494><s%> to idols <S%G1494><s%> is anything, <S%G5100><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> that an idol <S%G1497><s%> is anything <S%G5100><s%>?

[No,] but [I say] that the things which <S%G3739><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> sacrifice, <S%G2380><s%> they sacrifice <S%G2380><s%> to demons, <S%G1140><s%> and not to God; <S%G2316><s%> and I do not want <S%G2309><s%> you to become <S%G1096><s%> sharers <S%G2844><s%> in demons. <S%G1140><s%>

You cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> drink <S%G4095><s%> the cup <S%G4221><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> and the cup <S%G4221><s%> of demons; <S%G1140><s%> you cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> partake <S%G3348><s%> of the table <S%G5132><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> and the table <S%G5132><s%> of demons. <S%G1140><s%>
Or <S%G2228><s%> do we provoke <S%G3863><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> to jealousy <S%G3863><s%>? We are not stronger <S%G2478><s%> than He, are we?

All <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> are lawful, <S%G1832><s%> but not all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> are profitable. <S%G4851><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> are lawful, <S%G1832><s%> but not all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> edify. <S%G3618><s%>
Let no <S%G3367><s%> one <S%G3367><s%> seek <S%G2212><s%> his own <S%G1438><s%> [good,] but that of his neighbor. <S%G2087><s%>

Eat <S%G2068><s%> anything <S%G3956><s%> that is sold <S%G4453><s%> in the meat <S%G3111><s%> market, <S%G3111><s%> without <S%G3367><s%> asking <S%G350><s%> questions <S%G350><s%> for conscience' sake; <S%G1223><s%>
for the earth <S%G1093><s%> is the Lord's, and all <S%G4138><s%> it contains. <S%G4138><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> of the unbelievers <S%G571><s%> invites <S%G2564><s%> you, and you wish <S%G2309><s%> to go, <S%G4198><s%> eat <S%G2068><s%> anything <S%G3956><s%> that is set <S%G3908><s%> before <S%G3908><s%> you, without <S%G3367><s%> asking <S%G350><s%> questions <S%G350><s%> for conscience' sake. <S%G1223><s%>

But if <S%G1437><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> should say <S%G3004><s%> to you, "This <S%G3778><s%> is meat sacrificed <S%G7094><s%> to idols, <S%G7094><s%>" do not eat <S%G2068><s%> [it,] for the sake <S%G1223><s%> of the one <S%G1565><s%> who informed <S%G3377><s%> [you,] and for conscience' sake;

I mean <S%G3004><s%> not your own <S%G1438><s%> conscience, <S%G4893><s%> but the other <S%G2087><s%> [man's]; for why <S%G2443><s%> <S%G5101><s%> is my freedom <S%G1657><s%> judged <S%G2919><s%> by another's conscience <S%G4893><s%>?

If <S%G1487><s%> I partake <S%G3348><s%> with thankfulness, <S%G5485><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> am I slandered <S%G987><s%> concerning <S%G5228><s%> that for which <S%G3739><s%> I give <S%G2168><s%> thanks <S%G2168><s%>?

Whether, <S%G1535><s%> then, <S%G3767><s%> you eat <S%G2068><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> drink <S%G4095><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> whatever <S%G5100><s%> you do, <S%G4160><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> to the glory <S%G1391><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Give <S%G1096><s%> no <S%G677><s%> offense <S%G677><s%> either <S%G2532><s%> to Jews <S%G2453><s%> or <S%G2532><s%> to Greeks <S%G1672><s%> or <S%G2532><s%> to the church <S%G1577><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%>

just <S%G2531><s%> as I also <S%G2532><s%> please <S%G700><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G3956><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> things, <S%G3956><s%> not seeking <S%G2212><s%> my own <S%G1683><s%> profit, <S%G4851><s%> but the [profit] of the many, <S%G4183><s%> that they may be saved. <S%G4982><s%>
